task_text: Well, e-coat compatible primer trial for NovaAuto Components needs stronger capability in Progress / ERP administration. Who would be the best internal expert outside of the project to consult?

input.message:
The best internal expert to consult for Progress / ERP administration outside of the E-coat compatible primer trial project is **Alessandro Serra** (Corporate Leadership, HQ – Italy).

He has a **skill_progress_admin level of 10** – the highest rating in the company. This is significantly stronger than the current project team's capabilities in this area:
- Adrien Blanchet (Project Lead): level 3
- Leonardo Grimaldi (Engineer): level 2  
- Lazar Petrovski (Ops): level 2

Other strong alternatives at level 7 outside the project include:
- Davide De Luca (Corporate Leadership) 
- Arianna Orlando (Production – Italy)
- Marta Sorrentino (IT & Digital)
- Giuseppe Ferrara (IT & Digital)

Alessandro Serra would be the ideal consultant given his exceptional expertise level.
